[{"id": "header1", "type": "header", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\udee1\ufe0f Flansa Platform Administration", "col": 12}}, {"id": "para1", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "Super Admin portal for managing workspaces and platform configuration", "col": 12}}, {"id": "spacer1", "type": "spacer", "data": {"col": 12}}, {"id": "subheader1", "type": "header", "data": {"text": "Workspace Management", "col": 12}}, {"id": "link_platform_role_manager", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\udc65 Platform Role Manager - Manage platform-wide roles and permissions", "col": 6}}, {"id": "link_workspace", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83c\udfe2 Flansa Workspace - View and manage workspace registry", "col": 6}}, {"id": "link_workspace_builder", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83c\udfd7\ufe0f Workspace Builder - Build and configure workspace applications", "col": 6}}, {"id": "link_workspace_manager", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\udd04 Workspace Manager - Switch and manage workspace contexts", "col": 6}}, {"id": "spacer2", "type": "spacer", "data": {"col": 12}}, {"id": "subheader2", "type": "header", "data": {"text": "System Tools", "col": 12}}, {"id": "link_database", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "\ud83d\uddc4\ufe0f Database Viewer - Direct database access and query tool", "col": 6}}, {"id": "spacer3", "type": "spacer", "data": {"col": 12}}, {"id": "info_note", "type": "paragraph", "data": {"text": "
\u2139\ufe0f Navigation Hierarchy:
\u2022 Workspace Manager \u2192 Switch between workspace contexts
\u2022 Workspace Builder \u2192 Main application building interface
\u2022 App Dashboard \u2192 Lists tables within selected app
\u2022 Visual Builder \u2192 Design and configure table fields
\u2022 Form Builder \u2192 Create custom forms for data entry
\u2022 Report Builder \u2192 Design reports and analytics
\u2022 Dashboard Builder \u2192 Create analytics dashboards

Workspace builders should start from the Workspace Builder page to create and manage applications.
", "col": 12}}]
